author: BBC Sport
description: Former MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden is injured as a result of an accident while cycling in Italy.
title: Nicky Hayden: Ex-MotoGP champion in hospital after cycling accident in Italy

author: BBC Sport
description: Former MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden is in an "extremely critical" condition after suffering "serious cerebral damage" in a cycling accident.
title: Nicky Hayden: Ex-MotoGP champion 'extremely critical' after cycling accident

author: Chase Wilhelm
description: Dale Earnhardt Jr. opens up about the injured Nicky Hayden and how he chose to pay tribute to him this weekend at Charlotte Motor Speedway.
title: Dale Earnhardt Jr. on Nicky Hayden: ‘He’s an incredible person’ | FOX Sports

description: Former MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden suffers severe brain damage and is in extremely critical condition after being hit by a car while cycling in Italy.
title: MotoGP champ Hayden suffers brain damage in cycling accident
